title: An answer to the letter of the Roman Catholick souldier, as he calls himself in a letter from C.D. to A.B. the examiner of his Speculum : the souldiers letter is added at the end.
author: Tenison, Thomas, 1636-1715.
notes: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
"The Roman Catholick souldier's letter to Dr. Tho. Tenison" (p. 9-10) signed: T. Ward.
This work is variously attributed to Tenison and Wharton. cf. BM.
